title: Drive a Crooked Road (restored, with intro and outro) (1954, film noir, imdb score: 6.9)

sources.title: Drive A Crooked Road 1954 Restored Movie 720p
sources.description: Drive a Crooked Road is a 1954 American crime film noir directed by Richard Quine and starring Mickey Rooney and Dianne Foster . The drama's screenplay was adapted by Blake Edwards and Richard Quine from "The Wheel Man", a story by Canadian James Benson Nablo.
